basic.description: Focuses on a specific author or on a specific theme of Quebec literature. Topics will depend on the professor's interest and field of research. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Auteurs et thèmes en littérature québécoise

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite       (FREN230 and FREN241) or FREN221 or (FREN222 and FREN220).
Exclusion     No more than 3.0 units from FREN391 or FREN491.
